attributes.action: Exemption from testing for fully vaccinated people travelling back into the UK
attributes.additional_details: Change PCR tests before return and on day 2 and 8 into Uk
attributes.background: There should be not requirement for fully vaccinated people to have tests to return to UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586189
